column5: Here is a interesting 10 minute documentary on musky stocking in Minnesota that i found. They talk about finding muskies from waters where they have coexisted with pike. I think its from muskies inc.  Muskie stocking video

Thats a very interesting video,  thanks for sharing that with us...theres something to be learned about OVERFISHING ...and how easily fishermen can do great harm to a fishery,by keeping trophy fish,instead of releasing them....cheers
